subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: B. J. Upton tripled and drove in two runs Sunday to lead the streaking Atlanta Braves to a 3-2 victory over the Phillies and their first four-game sweep in Philadelphia since Sept. 24 to 27, 1964.
snippet: B. J. Upton tripled and drove in two runs Sunday to lead the streaking Atlanta Braves to a 3-2 victory over the Phillies and their first four-game sweep in Philadelphia since Sept. 24 to 27, 1964.
